Richard Garfield

Creator of Magic: The Gathering

Here's a brief history of Richard Garfield's life:

  • Born in Philadelphia
  • Family settled in Oregon when he was 12
  • Great-great-grandson of U.S. President James A Garfield
  • Grand-uncle invented the paper clip
  • Designed his first game when he was 13
  • Received a Cahelor of Science in Computer Mathematics in 1985.
  • Received a PhD in Combinatorial Mathematics from University of Pennsylvania in 1993
Richard Garfield's wiki page
